desc: I have a website that is about 10 years old and well established as far as longevity is concerned. However as SEO has become more complicated and I have less time I have fallen behind in website health and rankings. This is more core focus of improvement. If you search my company name I am obviously in the top spot first page of google. However my desired key words have slipped back and this is where I am failing.My website scores quite well under audit but is not strong on social media and a few other items. When I check the health on Nibbler and a few other online sources the result is quite good but not good enough.I have a total of two key phrases that I want as my benchmark to increase my overall rankings on all search engines with Google being the main focus.I have offered this job on Upwork and have been besieged with scammers and offers of greatness only to be disappointed. I have also been around a very long time and dont have a great deal of patients for anyone trying to worm more money out of me or treating me like a novice. If I employ you please do the job well and on time and there maybe additional work. Please consider this before accepting or replying. Thanks

desc: THIS IS YOUR CHANCE TO SET A NEW STANDARD IN A REAL FB ADVERTISING STRATEGY FOR REAL ESTATE.IMPORTANT:  Sorry but please DO NOT APPLY if your "strategy" is just accessing my FaceBook Ad platform and "selecting" targeted criteria (geographic area, income level, "likely to move", interest, etc.) Anybody can do that!  (including me..many times)Now that THAT is out of the way, I am looking for someone to be EXTREMELY CREATIVE and UNAFRAID to try UNCONVENTIONAL methods.I want to have a TALENTED freelancer to help me SELL a LUXURY HOME (6 MILLION DOLLARS)I am NOT interested in "reach" or "likes".  I am only interested in ENGAGEMENT (comments and shares).DO NOT try to BUY likes, comments or shares...all will be verified.I can certainly help identify a target audience BUT IT WILL BE UP TO YOU to ALSO bring ADDITIONAL strategies to this project.  (chatbot?  funnel?  ad words? anything you got!  anything you want to try!)There are SO MANY "FB Experts" that THIS WILL BE THE WAY I WILL PAY YOU.  I will pay a "good and fair" up front payment...BUT I WILL PAY A GENEROUS BONUS upon RESULTS!The talented FL will be awarded my next project which will be a 20 MILLION dollar home.(the home does not even need to sell but we have to demonstrate SOLID ANALYTICS to the owners of the home)Thank you...forgive the direct post...wish to honor your time (and mine) by being CLEAR.Now, LET"S SEE WHATCHA GOT! :)
